title: Preseason Magic
itunes:title: Preseason Magic
description:
On the #GMFB Podcast: Peter discussed his trip to a magic show in NYC (:50) and getting trips in before regular season travel begins (5:50); Kay talks about her weekend fantasy football show (6:25); The team shared their favorite parts of the preseason so far: Nate on Marshawn Lynch & the Raiders (7:55), Kyle on Myles Garrett & the Browns (9:30), Peter on rookie QBs (12:10) and what he’s hearing on Patrick Mahomes II (16:35), Kay on Chiefs RB Kareem Hunt’s fantasy value (19:50) and being intrigued by the Panthers (20:18); and finally, the team looks ahead to the Week 3 Preseason slate (21:18)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
